Class UiUtils

java.lang.Object
dev.bjdelacruz.commons.utils.UiUtils
public final class UiUtils extends Object
Contains UI-related utility methods.

  • Method Details

    • displayErrorMessage

      public static void displayErrorMessage(Component parent, String title, String msg)
      Displays an error dialog on the EDT.
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent component.
      title - The title of the error dialog.
      msg - The message for the error dialog.

    • useSystemLookAndFeel

      public static void useSystemLookAndFeel(Logger logger)
      Sets the look-and-feel (L&F) to the system L&F. If an exception is thrown, it is logged, and the application will exit.

      This method should be called in a static initializer block in the main class of your application.

      Parameters:
      logger - The logger to use to log exceptions if problems occur.

    • isRunningOnMacOS

      public static boolean isRunningOnMacOS()
      Returns true if this application is running on macOS, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      True if this application is running on macOS, false otherwise.

    • setDefaultTableCellBorderColorMacOS

      public static void setDefaultTableCellBorderColorMacOS()
      Sets the default table cell border color to gray. When an application is running in macOS, no border is drawn between cells in a JTable. Call this method if you want to see a border drawn between cells in your table (just like in Windows).

      Source: Stack Overflow

    • setEscKey

      public static void setEscKey(JFrame frame)
      Sets the ESC key to close the frame that is currently in focus.
      Parameters:
      frame - The frame that will be closed when the ESC key is closed.

    • closeFrame

      public static void closeFrame(JFrame frame)
      Closes the given frame.
      Parameters:
      frame - The frame to close.
